abilities.name: Starscythe
abilities.rule: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack (excluding attacks that target **MONSTERS** and **VEHICLES**), improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

abilities.name: Battlesuit Support Systems
abilities.rule: This unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Gun Drone
abilities.rule: The bearer is equipped with the following ranged weapon:

abilities.name: Marker Drone
abilities.rule: The bearer’s unit has the **MARKERLIGHT** keyword and can act as an Observer unit for another unit even if it Advanced this turn.

abilities.name: Shield Drone
abilities.rule: Add 1 to the bearer’s Wounds characteristic.

wargear_abilities.name: Gun Drone
wargear_abilities.rule: The bearer is equipped with the following ranged weapon:

wargear_abilities.name: Marker Drone
wargear_abilities.rule: The bearer’s unit has the **MARKERLIGHT** keyword and can act as an Observer unit for another unit even if it Advanced this turn.

wargear_abilities.name: Shield Drone
wargear_abilities.rule: Add 1 to the bearer’s Wounds characteristic.

wargear_options:
■ Any number of models can be equipped with up to two of the following, but cannot take duplicates:
◦ 1 gun drone
◦ 1 marker drone
◦ 1 shield drone
■ Any number of models can each have their T’au flamer replaced with 1 burst cannon.
■ Any number of models can each have their burst cannon replaced with 1 T’au flamer.
unit_composition:
